Text: I recorded this short capture from TV from Spain. I noticed they were talking about Andr?s Iniesta and quickly started to record. It\'s in spanish but images of Iniesta\'s goals (Chelsea) and now against Netherlands simply worths it. Also you can see the people of Iniesta hometown (Fuente Alvilla), his father, girlfriend and friends... Andr?s Iniesta: A living legend for Spanish people and F.C Barcelona fans.
